title: Exploring Rust's Reference Counting Mechanism
description: In this lab, we explore the usage of Rc (Reference Counting) in Rust which allows for managing ownership of a value by keeping track of the number of references.

meta.title: Rust Programming | Rc (Reference Counting) Usage
meta.description: Explore the usage of Rc (Reference Counting) in Rust, a powerful tool for managing ownership and multiple references to a value.
meta.keywords: Rust, Rc, Reference Counting, Programming, Ownership

i18n.title: 探索 Rust 的引用计数机制
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们探索 Rust 中 `Rc`（引用计数）的用法，它通过跟踪引用数量来管理值的所有权。

meta.title: Rust 编程 | `Rc`（引用计数）的用法
meta.description: 探索 Rust 中 `Rc`（引用计数）的用法，这是一个用于管理值的所有权和多个引用的强大工具。
